titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the 1993 increase in income taxes on Social Security benefits.

referral.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal, effective January 1, 2003, the 1993 increase in income taxes on Social Security benefits.
